mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCTNO AS PRODUCTNO, P.PNAME AS PNAME, C.CATEGORYNAME AS CATEGORYNAME, P.ID AS ID, FORMAT((P.PRICE), 0) AS PRICE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORYNO = C.CATEGORYNO

SELECT O.ORDERSNO as ORDERSNO, O.PNAME as PNAME , O.SALES_ID as SALES_ID, O.SYS_DATE as SYS_DATE, FORMAT((O.QUANTITY*O.PRICE), 0) AS SUMPRICE, O.DELIVERY as DELIVERY FROM ORDERS O INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.PRODUCTNO = P.PRODUCTNO
